description.line2: Our professionals will analyze and create high-quality drum sheet music for you.
description.line3: We provide custom quotes based on the song's difficulty and structure.

login.description: Please log in to submit a custom order request.

pricing.title: Pricing Information
pricing.note: * Final price will be provided as an individual quote after analyzing the song's difficulty and length.

c.name: Grade C
c.description: General K-pop, pop, adult contemporary songs under 5 minutes

b.name: Grade B
b.description: Slightly higher than intermediate difficulty or songs over 5 minutes

form.title: Custom Order Request Form
form.songTitlePlaceholder: Enter the song title you want to order
form.youtubeUrlPlaceholder: Enter YouTube URL for accurate sheet music creation (optional)
form.youtubeUrlHint: Please enter a YouTube URL for accurate sheet music creation. (Optional)
form.memoPlaceholder: Enter any notes or memos (max 500 characters)
form.note: After submission, you can check the progress in My Page "Custom Order History" and download the sheet music once completed.

request.title: Request Received
request.description: Your custom order request is received upon submission.

quote.title: Quote Sent
quote.description: We analyze the song and provide a quote through My Page.

payment.title: Payment Confirmed
payment.description: After confirming the quote and payment, production begins.

completed.title: Completed
completed.description: Download the completed sheet music from My Page.

quote.question: How do I check the quote?
quote.answer: You can check the quote in "Custom Order History" in My Page. We will provide a quote within 24 hours after your request.

production.question: How long does production take?
production.answer: Generally, it takes 1-3 days after payment confirmation. The duration may vary depending on the song's difficulty and length, and we will provide the exact schedule in the quote.

payment.question: What payment methods are available?
payment.answer: Currently, only bank transfer is available. We will provide bank account information along with the quote.

errors.submitError: An error occurred while submitting. Please try again.

messages.submitSuccess: Custom order request has been submitted. You can check the progress in My Page.
